        public java.lang.String twelveHourConversion(int i)

      • twelveHourtoInt

        public static int twelveHourtoInt(java.lang.String time)
        Converts time strings for 12 hour mode as its corresponding integer for the availability vectors.
        Parameters:
        time - The time as a string that the user inputs in 12 hour mode.
        Returns:
        an integer representing the time string's corresponding integer for the availability vector.
